para.emphasis: What happens if I forget my username/login?

answer.para: There are links to request your username or a password reset on the login page of the application. Select the information you need and provide the details requested to be notified of next steps.

You can review your account permissions under Account Settings. To access this page, select your username in the top navigation menu, then select "Account Preferences". The table will display the projects assigned to you and the permissions you have in each project.

para.emphasis: How do I update my account information?

answer.para: Account information such as contact info and password can be updated under Account Settings. To access this page, select your username in the top navigation menu, then select "Account Preferences".
